title: (x) Can anyone please ID this font for me? - Mabella {Mike F}
content:
Would be greatly appreciated if someone could identify this font for me please :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223214130/http:/typophile.com/files/font_184.jpg) | 2.25 KB |
author: angel82

comments.content: Any help to identify this font would be greatly appreciated. Thanks Kelly :)

That's [Mabella](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223214130/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=mabella&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=twinkles&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha), a font given away years ago by Ramiro Espinoza. Today he offers a redesign called [Bellucci](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223214130/http:/www.re-type.com/fonts/fonts-bellucci.html) via Retype.
Hi Mike - Thankyou so much for your help, we really appreciated it :)
